meanings.definition: A state of matter in which a fluid flows with zero viscosity.
meanings.sent1: Superfluids are special liquids that can flow without any resistance.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study superfluids to understand their unique properties.
meanings.sent3: The superfluids at the science fair were so smooth that they danced around obstacles effortlessly.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was a superfluid, flowing freely and effortlessly in her art.
meanings.sent5: The concept of superfluids is like a river of ideas that never encounters any obstacles.

meanings.definition: A substance that exhibits superfluidity at low temperatures.
meanings.sent1: The lab is researching new superfluids that can operate at extremely cold temperatures.
meanings.sent2: Superfluids have unique properties that make them fascinating to study.
meanings.sent3: The superfluids in the freezer were so cold that even the ice shivered.
meanings.sent4: His calm demeanor was like a superfluid, remaining unruffled even in the face of chaos.
meanings.sent5: The idea flowed through her mind like a superfluid, clear and unstoppable.
